Challenge

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Challenge.Entity
      • Challenge.Item
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Equipment, Key, Token

    abstract class Item
extends Entity
    An item is used to help a player navigate throughout the level. It can be collected, has its own sprite and is either consumable or is a permanent addition to the player's inventory.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Angelo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Item(javafx.scene.image.Image sprite)
      Constructs an item with its designated sprite.
